div.p: We thank C. Pardo for her insight and assistance during development of the idea. K. J. Feeley and E. M. Rehm were supported through National Science Foundation Awards DEB‐1257655 and DEB‐1350125, and P. Olivas was supported through National Science Foundation Award PRFB‐1202716. E. M. Rehm was supported by the Dissertation Year Fellowship from Florida International University. This is contribution #304 of the Program in Tropical Biology at Florida International University.
